women.title: Mila Cashmere Boxy Crop Sweater
women.details: AN ANYTHING-BUT-BASIC CASHMERE PULLOVER.Once you go 100% cashmere, you don't go back. This impossibly soft crewneck has the flattering shape, thoughtful details, and quality construction to carry you from season to season.

women.title: Billie Chunky Knit Oversized Cashmere Cardigan
women.details: COZY UP. Luxuriously soft and perfectly oversized, the Billie Cashmere Boyfriend Cardigan is crafted from premium Mongolian cashmere with a boxy, relaxed fit for effortless comfort.

women.title: Risa Cashmere-Wool Button Down Coat
women.details: GRADE A CASHMERE. Italic uses ultra-fine Grade A cashmere harvested from Capra Hircus goats in Mongolia. Unlike lesser cashmere, ours won't lose its shape, softness, or fray.

women.title: Mila Cashmere Boxy Crop Sweater
women.details: AN ANYTHING-BUT-BASIC CASHMERE PULLOVER. Once you go 100% cashmere, you don't go back. This impossibly soft crewneck has the flattering shape, thoughtful details, and quality construction to carry you from season to season.

women.title: Sophia Cashmere Quarter Zip Pullover
women.details: THE CASUAL PULLOVER MADE LUXE. Your everyday sweater just got zipped up a notch. Our highly-requested Sophia Cashmere Quarter-Zip Pullover is crafted from 100% Grade-A Mongolian cashmere for an effortlessly chic look.

women.title: Priscilla Silk Halter Mini Dress
women.details: MODERN MINIMALISM WITH A FLIRTY TWIST. Skillfully designed to flatter your form, this silk mini dress is ready for cocktail hour, date night, and everything in-between. Fully lined and cut on the bias from heavyweight 22 momme silk, it’s a romantic silhouette that softly hugs and skims...

women.title: Malone Silk Slip Dress
women.details: MODERN MINIMALISM WITH A FLIRTY TWIST. Skillfully designed to flatter your form, this silk mini dress is ready for cocktail hour, date night, and everything in-between. Fully lined and cut on the bias from heavyweight 22 momme silk, it’s a romantic silhouette that softly hugs and skims...

women.title: Lou Lightweight Lambskin Leather Jacket
women.details: MADE FOR COMPLIMENTS. Everything’s better in leather. Transform any outfit into a real head-turner with our latest outerwear essential. A cross between our Niki Leather Moto Jacket and our Lexi Suede Leather Jacket — the Lou delivers on durability, details, and edge...

women.title: Bella Lambskin Leather Boyfriend Blazer
women.details: BETTER THAN THE BOYS. Created from buttery-soft lambskin, this menswear-inspired leather blazer effortlessly captures the “model off duty” look. A slightly oversized fit is on trend, while perfectly placed darts keep things flattering through the torso.

women.title: Eloise Featherlight Silk-Cashmere Knit Long Sleeve
women.details: EVERYDAY SOPHISTICATION, RAIN OR SHINE. From sunny days to chilly weather, we've got you covered. Meet Eloise, a fine knit made from our luxurious blend of pure mulberry silk and Grade-A Mongolian cashmere. Light, breathable, and endlessly versatile, this knit can be worn on its own.
